<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Wrath](/Feats.aspx?ID=975) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. When you gain this feat, select acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You can call to the land to cast the [_acid splash_](/Spells.aspx?ID=3) cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components and deals the type of damage you chose instead of acid damage; the spell gains the trait appropriate to its damage instead of the [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) trait. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Elemental Wrath
